currentlyReading.title: Lose Your Mind: The Path to Creative Invincibility
currentlyReading.author: Josh Zimmerman
currentlyReading.alt: Book cover of Lose Your Mind: The Path to Creative Invincibility
currentlyReading.review: Started reading this on a whim and it's done a lot to help unblock some creative passageways. Josh is a great storyteller and brings a certain set of tools to help you free up creative expression. Read it, then read it again.
